content: "http://apnews.myway.com/article/20090524/D98CL30G1.html" "May 24, 9:54 AM (ET) WASHINGTON (AP) - President Barack Obama's top military adviser says Iran's objective is to obtain nuclear weapons - and that threatens the region. Adm. Mike Mullen says he's worried about Iran and what U.S. intelligence agencies don't know about the Tehran government. The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff says the United States and its allies must work to engage Iran's leaders. Mullen says there's a narrow window in which to work to block Iran from achieving nuclear capabilities. " Rally up boys, Israel is not going to wait to much longer.

Adm. Mike Mullen says he's worried about Iran and what U.S. intelligence agencies don't know about the Tehran government. The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff says the United States and its allies must work to engage Iran's leaders. Mullen says there's a narrow window in which to work to block Iran from achieving nuclear capabilities. " Rally up boys, Israel is not going to wait to much longer.
title: Military chief: Iran wants nuclear weapons

content: Thanks CJ for bringing this to my attention! Yes..it would de-stabilize the entire region. Iran with Nukes. I don't think the UAE even wants that to happen. The Straits of Hormuz(sp)...need the Straits open for oil tankers..many things to consider...Numerous Considerations! And, as per your post, the Intelligence Communities can't seem to get precise details of the Iranian Nuclear Capabilities. Yep! Let's keep an eye on Iran! And to think..I went to University with both Iraqis and Iranians. They were my friends then. They were called simply.."fred and sam". Wonder what happened to them? Oh well.
